job.title: DevOps Engineer
job.description: <p>Local Candidates Only</p><p>• 7+ years’ experience in Site Reliability Engineering, DevOps, or Software Engineering roles.</p><p>• 10+ years’ experience in Site Reliability Engineering, DevOps, or Software Engineering roles.</p><p>• 4+ years’ experience developing in Golang, Python, or other programming languages.</p><p>• 2+ years’ experience in IaC tools and languages such as Terraform, Ansible, Packer, or Helm.</p><p>• 2+ years’ experience with cloud providers (preferably AWS).</p><p>• Ability to prioritize, communicate well, design for repeatability and scalability, exude ownership, and dig beneath the hood with technology.</p>
